name: ChainJet
intro: Platform for building on-chain or off-chain task automations
introduce: ChainJet is a decentralized platform for building on-chain or off-chain task automations without having to code custom solutions. With ChainJet, users can integrate multiple services to automate all kinds of tasks. ChainJet provides an extensive collection of well-tested modules that perform a particular task each (e.g., transferring a token) and can be connected to one another to define the steps the automation will follow.
